content:
sizes xs - s/m - m/l - xl - xxl
finished measurements
bust 80-86-92-102-114 cm 31 5" - 33 7/8" - 36 25" - 40 1/8" - 44 7/8"
hem 68-74-80-92-102 cm 26 75" - 29 1/8" - 31 5" - 36 25" - 40 1/8"
the measurements may seem a little small but the garment will be very stretchy so make your usual size

additional materials 3 buttons

drops design 81-22 contains a pattern for both a cardigan and a tank top think twin set the above information is for the cardigan click for pattern information for the tank top 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crocheted-top-in-cotton-viscose-no-81-22
